name: Plan Elite KZN

services.title: Building & Construction
services.description: New buildings, houses, granny flats, garages, additions, extensions, retaining walls, roofing, and painting

services.title: Nutec & Wendy Houses
services.description: Nutec houses, wendy houses, guard huts, classrooms, workshops, offices, and storage sheds

services.title: Paving & Landscaping
services.description: Driveway, commercial, pool/patio, and walkway paving plus commercial and residential landscaping with instant grass supply and installation

services.title: Tiling & Flooring
services.description: Residential and commercial tiling, kitchen and bathroom tiling, new tile installation, and epoxy flooring

services.title: Awnings & Lapas
services.description: Fixed, louvre, retractable, and folding arm awnings plus brand new lapas, repairs, re-thatching, and upgrades

services.title: Cladding & Walling
services.description: Precast walling, wood cladding, dash cladding, brick cladding, vinyl cladding, stone cladding, pebble cladding, and fiber cement cladding

aboutText: We specialise in architecture and property development, enhancing the appeal of commercial and residential properties since 2016. With us, you'll experience the full journey — from architecture and development to interior design, all under one roof. We're the company that brings visions to life and sets the benchmark for excellence.
serviceAreas: Durban (Pinetown – Hillcrest – Bluff) | Durban North (Umhlanga – Ballito) | South Coast – KZN
